databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , MS_TANI.SEND_FLAG , MS_TANI.VESSEL_ID , MS_TANI.DATA_NO , MS_TANI.USER_KEY , MS_TANI.RENEW_DATE , MS_TANI.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_TANI.TS FROM MS_TANI
ORDER BY MS_TANI.TANI_NAME

SELECT MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , MS_TANI.SEND_FLAG , MS_TANI.VESSEL_ID , MS_TANI.DATA_NO , MS_TANI.USER_KEY , MS_TANI.RENEW_DATE , MS_TANI.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_TANI.TS FROM MS_TANI
WHERE MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = :MS_TANI_ID

INSERT INTO MS_TANI( MS_TANI_ID , TANI_NAME , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_TANI_ID , :TANI_NAME , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_TANI SET TANI_NAME = :TANI_NAME , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_TANI_ID = :MS_TANI_ID
